publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-966 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Civil Legal Aid (Financial Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2004-That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Civil Legal Aid (Financial Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2004 be approved. Supported by: Hugh Henry*
